item.description:

{
try
{ String member = command.substring(5);
String otherPName = command.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if(otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
p.teleportToX = 2940;
p.teleportToY = 3276;
p.heightLevel = 0;

			p.updateRequired = true;

			p.sendMessage("Jailed by "+playerName);
			}
			else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); }
		}
			catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to jail.."); }
	}
	else if	(absY >= 2940 && absY <= 3276)
	{
     sendMessage("You cannot teleport when your in jail!!!"); 
 }
else if (command.startsWith("openz"))

            //openWelcomeScreen(201, false, 0, lastlogin, lastlogintime);
	}
